hero.headline: A connected and compassionate Murray where all residents are empowered to thrive
hero.subheadline: Growing and building a stronger, safer community together.

partners.sectionSubtitle: Working together with community leaders and organizations to build a stronger, safer Murray.
partners.ctaDescription: Join our coalition of community organizations working together to make Murray a better place for all residents.

items.name: Salt Lake County Health Department
items.description: Offering a long list of programs including tobacco prevention, STD clinic, food protection, and community health initiatives.

items.name: Intermountain Medical Center
items.description: Providing advanced medical care in a friendly and supportive environment for the Murray community.

items.name: Murray School District
items.description: Dedicated to cultivating a safe, supportive, and inspiring environment where every student is empowered to succeed.

items.name: Murray City
items.description: Dedicated to preserving our rich history while building a vibrant, connected, and forward-thinking community.

items.name: Select Health
items.description: Offer plans to serve all members of our community from individuals and families to employers.

items.name: Murray Chamber of Commerce
items.description: Empowering local businesses, fostering community connections, and driving economic growth in Murray.

items.name: Exchange Club
items.description: Proudly dedicated to serving our community through Unity for Service and prevention of child abuse.

items.name: Murray Rotary
items.description: Dedicated to serving our community through impactful projects, fellowship, and leadership development.

items.name: Murray Youth Community Council
items.description: A union of student leaders and business partners who come together through networking, internships, and community service.
